application.doc: Exporting the user name mapping configuration file template

param.name: export
param.doc: An indication that this operation is to retrieve the entire file not just a snippet. This parameter is required

method.name: GET
method.id: Export the user name mapping configuration file template
method.doc: To export the user name mapping configuration file template with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export request parameter on the user name mapping Configuration File resource URI. The export parameter is what differentiates the retrieve operation and the export operation. If the export parameter is included in the URL, the entire file is exported. If no export parameter is included in the URL, a snippet of the file is retrieved.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-Type: plain/text
param.doc: HTTP response code and file text, for e.g. 200 \"The file text....\"

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.

param.name: Content-Type: plain/text
param.doc: HTTP response code and file text, for e.g. 200 \"The file text....\"

response.doc: File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.

param.name: Content-Type: plain/text
param.doc: HTTP response code and file text, for e.g. 200 \"The file text....\"

response.doc: An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: Content-Type: plain/text
param.doc: HTTP response code and file text, for e.g. 200 \"The file text....\"
